name: Jewels Fill Up
description:
The goal is to drag and drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the grid table both vertically and horizontally. If there is no position for the given block on the screen, the game will end. Don't forget to keep space for the blocks from filling the screen.

Features:
- Casual puzzle game
- Amazing graphics and sound effects
- Easy and simple puzzle game
- Play game without internet
- Relaxing and brainstorming
- No time limit
